What a bizarre movie. I thought the subtitles were completely wrong at the beginning but soon realized this movie and the characters are really strange. But I highly recommend giving it a watch. Imagine Ones Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest as a love story.... on acid. 

The quality is great. It's split into two video files, both almost an hour long each. I used VLC player and had no problem with the subtitles. There are multiple languages. 

Thanks again noriegaRJ!
